meanings.definition: Far on or ahead in development or progress.
meanings.sent1: The students in the advanced class were learning difficult subjects.
meanings.sent2: She was proud of her advanced skills in playing the piano.
meanings.sent3: The advanced squirrel managed to find all the hidden nuts in record time.
meanings.sent4: Her advanced knowledge of astronomy allowed her to predict the meteor shower.
meanings.sent5: The advanced technology made the new smartphone incredibly fast.

meanings.definition: Beyond the elementary or introductory level.
meanings.sent1: The advanced math course covered complex equations.
meanings.sent2: He struggled with the advanced level of the foreign language class.
meanings.sent3: The advanced jigsaw puzzle was missing a piece, making it impossible to complete.
meanings.sent4: Her advanced understanding of physics made her a valuable member of the research team.
meanings.sent5: The advanced ballet performance left the audience in awe.

meanings.sent1: The advanced booking system allowed customers to reserve seats months in advance.
meanings.sent2: The advanced technology company was always working on the latest innovations.
meanings.sent3: The advanced clock in the movie set the time for the entire adventure.
meanings.sent4: His advanced age did not stop him from exploring new hobbies.
meanings.sent5: The advanced civilization had already discovered space travel.
